{{Infobox Berry |name = Grepa |image = [[File:Grepa.png]] |caption = One bite of this very tender Berry fills the mouth with its sweet and tangy flavor. |growtime = 2h 0m 0s |harvest = 24 berries |replant = 20% |points = 600 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Grepa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Aguav]] and at least 1 [[Figy]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 5 mins || 56 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 33 mins 20 secs || 2 hours - 4 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:GrepaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:GrepaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:GrepaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Grepa berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 45px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
